Methods.Name: urlParams
Methods.Description: Module to read in all location hash and query parameters.

Definitions.hashParams: Object. Key value pairs of hashtag parameters in the URL.
Definitions.hashPramsCount: Number. Count of hashtag parameters in the URL.
Definitions.searchParams: Object. Key value pairs of the query parameters in the URL.
Definitions.searchParamsCount: Number. Count of the query parameters in the URL.
